headline.print_headline: Christie Gets Extension in Lane Closures Lawsuit
headline.main: Christie Gets Extension in Lane Closures Lawsuit

lead_paragraph: Gov. Chris Christie and other defendants will get more time to file their responses to two lawsuits related to the September lane closures at the George Washington Bridge that are central to a traffic jam scandal threatening the Republican governor's political ambitions.
